snippet: The coordinated assault by four bombers dressed in police uniforms came as officers in Logar Province were filing into the dining hall for lunch.
abstract: Taliban claims responsibility for killing at least 20 police officers and wounding eight others when four suicide bombers disguised in police uniforms enter a heavily fortified station in Logar Province, Afghanistan, and detonate vests packed with explosives.
lead_paragraph: The coordinated assault by four bombers dressed in police uniforms came as officers in Logar Province were filing into the dining hall for lunch.

headline.main: Taliban Attack Kills at Least 20 Afghan Police Officers
headline.print_headline: Afghanistan: Taliban Kill at Least 20 Police Officers
